title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2316/97 of 21 November 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3886/92 as regards the information which Member States are required to communicate to the Commission for the premium schemes in the beef and veal sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2316/97 of 21 November 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3886/92 as regards the information which Member States are required to communicate to the Commission for the premium schemes in the beef and veal sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following the date of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
